segments.text: Do you like shopping at flea markets ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: l love it . There is always something fascinating to discover .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The antiques market here in Paris is very famous . It's called Le marche aux puces de Saint-Ouen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's not very easy to say .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's also known as Les Puces , which means â€˜ The Fleas ' .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you find many bargains there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it really depends . Because you are a tourist , it might be harder for you to get really good prices .
segments.speaker: S1
